context: A security incident has been detected in our organization involving the execution of a known credential theft tool. Specifically, the tool `mimikatz.exe` was executed with the command line `mimikatz.exe lsadump::dcsync /domain:vnevado.alpineskihouse.co /user:xfbzkp` to potentially dump users' credentials. This activity is indicative of malicious intent to extract sensitive information such as keys and plain-text passwords.
question: Following the execution of mimikatz.exe, PsExec was subsequently used to launch another command on a remote device. Can you determine the name of the script or file used in the PsExec command?
solution_steps: A known credential theft tool was executed with the user having SID `S-5-7-21-1843151660-3234030288-105586167-1422`.
PsExec was used to launch the command `get-krbticket.ps1` on a remote device.
